Reviews.Title: Tested and passed
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: Bought one of these and am pretty impressed. super light weight and has all the same mounting hardware as the gopro. Has an lcd color screen to see what your pointed at before you film and for reviewing what you've filmed. One word of caution though. DO NOT USE ANY SD CARD OTHER THAN A CLASS 4 OR 5. If you use any higher class sd card the camera will malfunction when it is hooked up to the computer when attempting to review or transfer.Emerson technical support has already told me that these cameras are a fairly new product and that there is a glich with any sd card higher than class 5. I went through 2 cameras (returned them to the store) before I contacted Emerson and they explained the problem. handles up to 32 gig BUT it has to be a class 4 or 5 only.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but great waterproof dive cam! Image quality in picture mode is horrible
Reviews.Author: Somedude "Computer consultants Boston"
Reviews.Content: Doesn't say how deep this case is good for, but for playing in the water in Hawaii (surfing etc) this is great as long as you don't decide to walk on the bottom of the sea (haha)Camera and accessories feel a little bit on the cheap side but works great and quality is good for the price (a cheap alternative to gopro)Also the camera mounts ok to a motorcycle and video is a little bit jumpy because the video isn't image stabilizedAlso as mentioned in a previous review, use a class 4 Micro SD card, if you use anything less or more it will freeze (I put a class 2 card in and it froze right away when recording)Also update: the image quality in picture mode is horrible ... see my picture in the product images .. video quality is good though, just picture mode is horrible (possibly because of no image stabilization)

Reviews.Title: Nearly a GoPro
Reviews.Author: L.K.
Reviews.Content: This action cam is nearly a GoPro and is 1/4 the price. It is plastic, however. Remember when you buy this that it doesn't come with a motocross helmet mount-it comes with a velcro strap mount for a bicycle helmet and a 7/8" handlebar mount. Takes a terrific video, but the sound isn't good at all. Bear in mind that customer service is positively terrible, so you'll just have to deal with the seller.

Reviews.Title: OK if you just want a toy
Reviews.Author: Mom2Gavin

} } } Length:: 0:19 MinsI had low expectations for the price, but unfortunately even these were not met. Package arrived yesterday and I immediately tested it by walking slowly outside holding it in my hand. First off, the video is extremely shaky due to the lens, which does not capture a wide view at all which accentuates shaking and vibration. For those familiar with 35mm cameras this lens is a 50mm equivalent, or about half as wide as a standard wide-angle lens on most cameras. Doesn't even come close to a gopro. Secondly, the video is distorted, and becomes stretched near the edges of the frame - so as subjects move around the frame they look like they are in a funny-house mirror. This is probably due to a very cheap plastic lens. After looking at these videos on my PC, and even trying to correct the shake and distortion with my pro video editing software, I declared this a failed experiment and boxed it up for return. Not sure yet whether I am going to spring for a gopro (probably) or just use the video on my hand-held camera for now.I'll give this two stars because I could see how it might work for relatively still applications such as shooting or just as a kid's toy camera. But for any real action like biking - even road biking for which I intended to use it - I think you will be very disappointed.I've uploaded the test video so you can see what I mean about the shaking and distortion. I promise I was holding the camera as still as possible!

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: pete barry
Reviews.Content: the camera is very light. lighter then a gopro hero 3 . has its own screen unlike the gopro .the helmet mount is for a bicycle helmet not a motorcycle helmet ( i had to order a suction cup mount )the video is great . has HD widescreen mode that is very clear .waterproof case works great . the 1st thing i did was submerge it into a 55 gallon drum full of water and it was perfectly dry and you could see very nice underwater .only cons i can think of is that there is a small black cap on the mount that secures the tightening nut ,that just falls out (i super glued it in place ) and the mount doesn't have a up down movement just left -right makes it a little tricky to get the picture centered on a helmet cus you have to move the whole mount on the helmet i am very satisfied it worked better than i thought .(dont forget to adjust the settings to HD or the picture isnt so great )

Reviews.Title: Really great alternative to gopro camera
Reviews.Author: Ms. Jean L. Lubrano "craftqueen"
Reviews.Content: Cheaper, and okay not the greatest video, but good enough for you to use it when you go on vacation or skateboarding like my nephew I got it for!

Reviews.Title: Go-Amatuer
Reviews.Author: Luther
Reviews.Content: This much cheaper than a Go-Pro.For those who are not willing to burn a hole in their pocket, this is a much cheaper alternative.Emerson ActionCam Digital Camera is one of the cheapest alternative with screen and it’s easy to use.Totally acceptable for the price:- Comes with a SCREEN- 5.0 Megapixel- HD Digital Video 720p -1280 x 720- Integrated microphone (not that fantastic)- 4X digital zoom (Don’t bother using digital zoom)- Rechargeable Li-ion battery- Camera Shield- Micro USB to USB Cable- Waterproof Housing- Helmet mount- Bike mountIt’s worth a 5 star rating, comparing other action cameras of its class (Evaluation based on perceived cost and benefit).

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Roger V. Verzosa "pnyglfr"
Reviews.Content: I received this camera last week and used it on the 50 miles bike ride.  The video turn out nicely and you can hear the sound as well.  Great camera for the price.  If you are thinking of getting this camera, buy the 16G SD.  I've used my 4G SD and didn't captured my whole ride.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: geekedoutdad
Reviews.Content: These are great action cameras, i bought one and use it very often! I love it! You will be surprised at how well they do work under water.

Reviews.Title: video perfect
Reviews.Author: kevin ferguson
Reviews.Content: works great takes really decent videos have not tried the camera part though. make sure you charge the 1st time for at least 6-8 hrs or it may not function properly at first i thought crap it keeps freezing up . but then i decided to let it charge overnight and wala perfect!

Reviews.Title: works surprizingly well.
Reviews.Author: bigdawg3771
Reviews.Content: Movies are really fun to make.The clarity is surprizing.I bought this for my 15 & 14 year olds, and they love them.My 15 yr old has it on his dirtbike, and my 14 yr old has one on her atv.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Isla
Reviews.Content: Although reviews rate the product good and on the cheap side, My review for Go Action is it is a great camera at a great price. The camera has worked wonderfully underwater (less than 30 feet) and in aquatic sports.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Shane bowlin
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for paintball. Housing has takin direct hits still no problems. Steal of the century. Don't waste your money on other like it you can get three or four of these for same cost

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: koolaid_kid
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera.  Installed a 32 GB Class 10 card.  Recorded some video at 720P.  Removed card and installed in PC.  Played just fine.Good camera for the price, and uses standard camera mounts, unlike the GoPro, which uses proprietary mounts.

Reviews.Title: Best deal for POV cam
Reviews.Author: Timothy L. Kemmerly "kimtemmerly"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for use on a mountain bike and really its gone above and beyond my expectations.  I was worried that it was so cheap there was no way it could be a quality product but honestly its the best deal you can get on the web if your looking for an action cam.  It comes with a great handlebar mount and helmet mount plus the waterproof case which I haven't tested.  The quality of the picture is not 1080p but 720p is fine for what I am using it for.  The value of this cam has really blown me away.

Reviews.Title: Surprising Quality
Reviews.Author: V. James
Reviews.Content: Upon first inspection, I thought the camera looked and felt very cheap.  I was pleasantly suprised at the 720p HD video quality. The cam, though really small, is really easy to use.  The zoom in HD is surprisingly clear.  The 640x480 resolution is great for home movies, and with an 8gb memory card, you get about an 90 minutes of record time.  You get 40 min. on an 8gb card at 720p HD.  The waterproof case is extremely durable and definitely waterproof.  Have fun with this 1!

Reviews.Title: Works with my Class 10 sd card
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Just tried one and works fine with a 16 gig Sandisk Class 10 microsd card. Looks like a great deal at this price. Can't wait to use it on the boat... believe it or not I bought three of them. Should be some interesting fish catching videos!!!

Reviews.Title: This item is plastic, but I think it is great!!
Reviews.Author: Mike Loomis
Reviews.Content: My Go Pro broke and they would not do anything with it as it was over a year old.  SO, I started looking for an alternative.  I read about this camera and went on You Tube and found it to be as good as the Go Pro.  I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the $$$
Reviews.Author: M. Carlson "Maureen"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this at Menards for $35 the day after Thanksgiving for my Husband. We take our Jeeps off road and this will be great for capturing the adventures and posting on Facebook you get about 90 minutes in lo resolution and 30-40 in high resolution. it came with a 8mg card we will upgrade to a 32 for longer video shooting time. Light weight very sturdy and even has good sound Quality

Reviews.Title: All that I had expected for the price.
Reviews.Author: Tommy Shields
Reviews.Content: I had been shopping for an action cam for a while and didn't know which one to choose. My first thought was the Go Pro due to the familiarity of the name. But i thought there must be an alternative because I really didn't want to spend $200-$400 on a camera and this one has a screen build in. I ended up finding this. It had some mixed reviews, but for the price, I figured why not? the picture quality isn't all that great but it will do. it is easy to use and the screen is really nice. the two mounts that come with it seam to be good quality and i like the water resistant case. the only down side to this that i see is the picture isn't all that great and when i turn it on the screen it glitches for a few seconds. before you go spending a lot of money on a Go Pro you should try this out. What is there to lose? If you aren't happy, return it. but i am happy with it. For $40, you could't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: sort of a let down
Reviews.Author: Lauren.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my boyfriends birthday present and it surely irritated us at first. It took awhile to get it started and now he loves it.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done.
Reviews.Author: Ausum J
Reviews.Content: This is no GoPro but will get the job done. Does not so great for getting sound but you can catch them video moments easily!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jsharpeprt
Reviews.Content: For the price we paid this has been a great camera. We have taken it swimming, dirt bike riding and skiing and it has been great.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: Brandon L Reedy
Reviews.Content: Is this the best camera ever? No, of course notAt a sub $40 price point, however, you really can't go wrong. Read all the reviews a day take them with a grain of salt. Amazon has a good return policy and the Square Trade is approximately $4.The camera takes a long time to charge, like 8+ hours and the video is average. The waterproof case works and survived a day of live fire training with no I'll effects.A wide angle lense would be nicer, but for the price, if you are contemplating a action cam or don't want to risk losing a Go-Pro then the Emerson is what you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: Go Pro----No Way!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Harold Payne
Reviews.Content: This was a very good deal for an action cam. I bought it to take on vacation and could not believe how this tiny camera performed.  The battery lasted the entire day that we used it in the ocean snorkeling and in the river tubing and also in the pools. Not a drop inside the protective case and the pictures /videos turned out very well. The sound will be muffled if shooting video though. It also floats while in its protective case so I wasn't afraid of it sinking to the bottom of the sea. Very good choice for the money verses what they want for a Go Pro

Reviews.Title: Poor build quality
Reviews.Author: aaron schweikl
Reviews.Content: Power button broke after 2 uses. It turns on and off until the battery is depleted. Its a shame the picture was actually OK.

Reviews.Title: Quality camera
Reviews.Author: Chase Adams
Reviews.Content: The first one we got didn't charge so we sent it back in and then we got a new one! It works like a charm!

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: Its really good for the priceWould have given it 5 stars if it would have came with everything it was supposed to.It didn't come with the mounts

Reviews.Title: good idea gone bad
Reviews.Author: Tony007
Reviews.Content: This camera is really a good idea, comes with all the mounts and has a screeen so  you can actually see what your shooting, problem is that it doesnt work. It will work for the first time you hit record, if you stop and start again forget it. Even if you power off and power back on and try to record a second video it wont do it, just locks up. Very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice Cam - Just as Good As Go Pro
Reviews.Author: Video Doc
Reviews.Content: Shoots HD & SD Video.  We mounted it to a Fire Helmet for training Videos.Works well.  Have not tried it in heat.Lots of mounting options.

Reviews.Title: Southern Telecom Emerson Action Camera Black Digital Cameras
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Travers "Paddler"
Reviews.Content: I was a little leery about buying this camera but for the price I felt I had nothing to lose.  I tried it out for the first time this weekend.  I mounted it to my kayak and headed out on the water.  I have to say that I was quite impressed with the quality of the video.  I have a Kodak Playsport camera and a Panasonic Lumix waterproof camera in my adventure camera arsenal and the Emerson was right up there as far as picture quality goes.  I was on the water for an hour and the battery charge lasted the whole trip.  I like the fact that it has a view screen on the back too.  First impressions is that for the price it's worth it but time will tell.

Reviews.Title: not better than I expected!!!
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: I posted a glowing review of this unit but... later when actually trying to use it I found it had no time laps (just a countdown to one photo timer), it only records about an hour of video on a full battery charge, and the clip fell off the case latch (I could fix it but not happy finding another role pin that fit).So many cameras can do what this one can do. Granted it works, some will find it a cool camera... I think it could be a cool camera with a couple more options (including working on USB power besides just charging the battery)and for sure it needs better night viewing optics ...  Time laps would be nice to.I dont know if the GoPro has any of that, I do know my mini trail camera (or the Zetta Z12) can do what this camera can do and has most everything else I wanted ... so that is what I use (all day, with no annoying battery recharging down time).

Reviews.Title: Well priced action camera!
Reviews.Author: Doc1buc
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera!  I have taken about four hours worth of video ranging from shooting clays to driving to work.  Camera takes good video and the battery life is over 2 hours of continuous use.  Camera is "basic" meaning no WiFi contol etc, but for most people this will fit the bill.  Be advised, one member stated that ALL GoPro harnesses and mounts would fit this item...that is wrong.  You have to rig the 1/4 screw to "mate" with the GoPro attachments.  It can be done but it isn't an instant fix.

Reviews.Title: For the price you cant beat it
Reviews.Author: Keith Franklin
Reviews.Content: I'm content with it, didn't want to spend $300 on a tiny camera I don't use all the time. I like the fact you can mount it, mount seems just a little scary when tightening it down. I was afraid I was going to crack something.

Reviews.Title: good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: chuck semrad
Reviews.Content: if you don't want to pay 400 dollars for this type of actin camera then this is the one to get. clear videos and easy operation. the only reason I did give it 5 stars was it only lasts about an hour.

Reviews.Title: NO SOUND
Reviews.Author: Carson
Reviews.Content: On the camera itself it says "mic" and advertises it has built in sound, well when I go back to hear my videos i recorded there was NO sound at all, just a annoying screeching sound. Whole day of great videos with no sound. Do NOT buy this.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good
Reviews.Author: stephen "Listing on the fly"
Reviews.Content: Although it is not as hardened as some of the other action cams this little camera does the job for less than half the cost. Good cam for all kinds of sports video

Reviews.Title: Good Video, Great value.
Reviews.Author: hopbad
Reviews.Content: This camera made me kinda nervous because of its low price, but it does entry level action videos very good. It has everything my son has needed yet. Now if I can get over my nervousness of my son doing Johnny Knoxville videos.

Reviews.Title: for the price...
Reviews.Author: M Edge "Martin"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera kind of knowing what to expect. For $40 some things have been expectantly left out of the package. These are some of the things that this camera does not have:1. Somewhat narrow field of view. It is notably smaller than my other cameras.2. No wireless connectivity3. No 1080 HD, only 720 and lower4. Battery is not removable - I like being able to swap out batteries out on a shoot. Waiting for it to recharge wastes time.5. Low light shooting get very grainy.What it does have is why I bought it1. It is light, and small2. It uses 1/4 x 20 thread mount, which is a standard camera mount. So it will fit onto tripods and anything else made to mount a camera.3. The waterproof case works, and works well in my experience.4. The menu is simple to use, no need for the manual. Took me 10 minutes to get it set up to use.5. The view finder is a great help. My high end cameras don't have built in view finders. I always use the screen, especially when reviewing footage.I have go pros and contours and know what each one is best suited for filming wise. This camera was bought for 'B' roll film and testing out theories for filming, especially where there is a chance the camera could be lost or damaged. It is no a 1st choice camera but is a great back up/test dummy.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the quality for the money
Reviews.Author: Jeromy
Reviews.Content: Wonderful product, i put it on my boat while fishing and caught some fish.  Very cool product, for $70 I did not care too much if it got a little wet.  Well it did and it worked fine on the next outing.  What a bargain!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I got it just a few days ago but so far I really like it. It is true, is not the gopro, but neither is that expensive. I does not have a great photo mode but lets be honest, you want it for video. The resolution of the video is fine, I just bough it for mu bike to record my rides, just in case. The battery life is great, I read it had like 25 minutes but today I recorded more than an hour. It took my phone's sd card, which is a micro sd class 10. But then I put another 2 gb sd card and it wasn't working. all I did was insert the sd in the cpu, fix issues, format it and worked! The mounts are the best but they get the work done. If you have the money for something expensive go for it, but for the price this little camera is great!I love the screen it has for playback.

Reviews.Title: It Worked Well for Me
Reviews.Author: Car Guy
Reviews.Content: Bought it for a trip to Hawaii. The whole family used it during snorkeling and cavorting in the surf. It took a beating in the waves, but no water leaked into the case. Takes OK pictures out of water, so so pictures underwater (but much better than the disposable UW film cameras you can get in Hawaii). Forget about the screen viewfinder under water-you won't be able to see a thing. Just point and shoot and hope that you get your shot. We took enough shots to ensure we got some good ones. It was fun and is worth the money as long as you don't expect too much.

Reviews.Title: Good Cheap Camera.
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera at discount store for 40.00 without the SD card or USB.  I had read reviews on here so I knew it didn't come with these in advance.  Instead of getting one at the store I just used the cable from my Garmin watch and a SD card from a old blackberry I had. So far I have had no problems with it and for 40.00 I cant complain.

Reviews.Title: Audio has issues
Reviews.Author: Dain A. Wood
Reviews.Content: I took this camera to a dubstep show the other night, and after transferring the footage to my computer  I realized that every single video file had audio issues. 5 -10 seconds into each video, the audio would fade to almost nothing, without fail.I guess I can't complain, since I did buy this product from Big Lots for about half the price, but it's still rather frustrating.I am using a class 10 SDHC card, but I was told there shouldn't be any issues with a class 10 if you're using a card reader to transfer the footage, which is what I did. so I don't know.the video quality seems fine.

Reviews.Title: Good quality and good price
Reviews.Author: Tyson
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera as a present for Christmas. I was impressed at the durability and weight of the camera plus the mounts. I plan on using it as a helmet cam and the helmet strap and mount are impressive. They dont move (when secured properly) and it isnt heavy.The only issue ive come across (and i did not know prior to this) was the type of class your sd card had to be. I accidentally used a class 2 and almost ruined the camera. (Btw, thanks to another review on here for explaining) USE A CLASS FOUR OR FIVE sd card, nothing more nothing less. Other than that i was a little bit disappointed with the picture width. Its too zoomed in (even zoomed as far out as possible) and doesn't provide a great field of vision. But for medium to long distance shooting, its not bad at all. Overall great product, great quality, and great price. Definitely worth your money.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jason J. Owen
Reviews.Content: First and foremost this is a cheap camera. It does not compare with a go-pro. You want a camera in that league plan to pay for it accordingly. What I wanted was a cheap camera that I wouldn't "cry" over if I lost it or broke it on dives were equipment is abused and easily lost. When I saw this it fit the bill perfectly. Unfortunately, there is no depth rating that I have been able to find so taking it on dives has been a bit worrisome as I had no idea if it would hold up, leak or implode! So far I have had it down to 30 ft and it has worked great! The video didn't come out real clear as I did not have it properly aligned with the lighting source. Still working on that but so far I am very happy with this camera for what I paid for it. It should be noted that is does not come with an SD card and you need the properly rated card as has been posted in other reviews.

Reviews.Title: Passable performance
Reviews.Author: bk
Reviews.Content: This would be a good starter camera for an active child wanting to record his or her activities. It has passable performance in limited light, meaning that it will produce a decent low resolution image or video in typical nighttime lighting. In daylight it is better, but is still not close to HD quality. Color tends to brighten and wash out and with zero image stabilization tends to be jerky. Panning has to be done very slowly to prevent blurring. These things mean that attached to bike handlebars or a helmet will produce video that's difficult to watch. The camera is vibration sensitive, producing almost constant "jello effect."  It's chief value is its low price, and so putting it in the hands of a seven or eight year old or hanging it from the collar of a pet isn't as risky as it might be with a more expensive unit like a Swann, a Contour, or a GoPro. I would suggest that those who want to record their adventures skydiving, snow boarding, biking or other sports spend the extra money for a higher quality unit.It is easy to operate and has easy to use controls that are not at all complex. Choosing photo, video or playback is achieved by a three position slide switch on the side of the unit. The power and shutter switches are on top. It has an LCD screen that allows the operator to see and frame shots when hand held. You will need to purchase a microSD card of at least 2 gigabytes to use the camera. It will recognize larger volume cards --I used a 32GB card and it worked just fine. The camera is NOT waterproof in any way and should be kept away from water in spite of the GoPro-like "waterproof" case.It does not charge quickly. The initial charging took four hours and recharging it after a half hour of video took almost two hours. Transferring files from the camera to computer is pretty slow as well: it took six and a half minutes to copy a 900MB video file to my laptop, a feat that takes two minutes with my GoPro or Contour Roam.All in all the Emerson camera has features that make it useful, but its low video quality limits the camera's value considerably. It comes with a wrist, helmet, and tripod adapter mounts. It recharges and transfers images via an included USB cable.

Reviews.Title: Not for a mountain bike
Reviews.Author: Jordan Rozycki
Reviews.Content: This will outperform what a camera at this price should do.  The box shows a mountain bike and the camera mounted to the handlebar.  No go.  When screwed in all the way, mine would face about 40 degrees to the right.  The video was very shaky and at times unrecognizable.  The trail wasn't extreme.  Clear video if it's going to be still such as monitoring or underwater use.  Do yourself a favor.  When shopping for a camera like this, go to youtube and view other peoples videos.  I returned this and purchased a contour camera since online videos shows mountain bikes used with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good action cam
Reviews.Author: Bluemartian
Reviews.Content: I bought mine for about $55. For that price you can't go wrong. Decent pictures and videos, perfect for posting on YouTube or Facebook, even as 3x5 pictures the image looked good.I go spear diving and I took it down maybe 15-20 feet, and stayed out in the water maybe an hour or so, the waterproof housing worked great. Not even a drop of water.Never used a go-pro so I can't compare the picture qualities but for my amateur purposes this camera works great.

Reviews.Title: Zombie Cam -_-
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: So it arrived brand new and on time, props to the seller.I charged it, put the micro SD card in, then put it back in the case that was mounted on my bike.I turned it on, the Emerson boot screen loaded and it was giving me real time picture, great. I went downstairs and hit the shutter button and my camera is now permanently on. It is in a zombie stasis, it looks alive but is dead, won't respond to any of the buttons, won't power off, won't recognize anything even if plugged in to the computer, removed the memory card and replaced it. I tried googling if anyone else had similar issues but couldn't find anything of help.I will call the tool free number for Emerson tonight.So far it looked great but the 'Made in China' is biting me in the ass.

Reviews.Title: Should have listened to others giving it 1 Star!
Reviews.Author: A.R.G.
Reviews.Content: Best part of this purchase was the exhiliration of receiving it. Everything from there went down hill.I knew going in this wasn't going to be like my GoPro but wanted a 2nd camera for back-up.This is very cheaply made and I may have kept it anyway with the exception of it not working from day 1. Used correct SD Card (Class 4) but both camera and video feature froze the camera on with no way to turn off. Had to let it drain battery down before I could boot up again.Good thing I tried it on land before I took it on the kayak. Major disappointment.If they get this freeze problem fixed and work on their non-existent customer support group, they may have something worth using.

Reviews.Title: camera did not work
Reviews.Author: Lisa Nula
Reviews.Content: This camera did not even turn on after we followed the proper directions to charge it.  We were very disappointed with this purchase and will buy one locally to save us the hassle.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Bry13
Reviews.Content: Its a good camera. The only issue is that within the water proof case you cant adjust the zoom or switch modes. But its worth it

Reviews.Title: included mounts:(
Reviews.Author: ronald
Reviews.Content: this camera... its fantastic and this is how its better than gopro1 BUILT IN SCREEN i mean come on go pro 80 bucks for a screen2= camera/video selectr is an actuall switch not a sieries of button pushes like go pro so there is no confusion3 the waterproof housing has a normal tripod female threads so you can mount it with a bolt or screwcon the helmet mount is flimsy attached with a band strip of webbing and the webbing was too long to fit in my helmet vent holes so i used hook and loop because i have a military helmet with it on there

Reviews.Title: Go Action Cam for the price takes a reasonable video  - Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: fred
Reviews.Content: HD Go Action Cam for the price takes a reasonable video as well as pictures.  Remember you are not paying much for this cam so don’t expect much in return.  I wish the cam had a better battery life.  In HD mode I get around 22 minutes of video.  Hardly enough recording time if you hope to record any time on the bike.  Have emailed customer service and haven’t had a response.  This cam is best for use in the backyard or maybe a ride on a bike around the neighborhood.  After that the battery is drained.

Reviews.Title: Suprisingly great!
Reviews.Author: J. Nicolich "fixadix"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 13yr old for his birthday for when he snowboards. But make sure the helmet has the slits on top or you will have to use the strap. Surprisingly it works pretty well! He loves it and for the price I didn't care if it got trashed. Just wanted it to make it through the winter. Still working so now he wants to put it on his bike!

Reviews.Title: not working
Reviews.Author: Luciano Nuñez "luchi"
Reviews.Content: Not a good product illuminates little. It is very expensive please do not purchase this product very bad yes I do not consider good

Reviews.Title: Cool camera for the money.
Reviews.Author: Brandon J. Henderson
Reviews.Content: This little camera is fun to experiment with, at far less money than a GoPro.  I would recommend it to anybody that wants to play around a bit without spending big money.  The picture is good as long as the light conditions are decent.  The mounts that come with are handy but you have to be careful to keep the vibration and bouncing to a minimum.

Reviews.Title: Low quality Item
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: This action camera is not worth getting even if they gave it away for free.Let me start with the quality of the materials. The case seems to hold up Okay but the latch that holds it shut is made of cheap plastic that failed after a few days. This leaves the entire case useless since what good is a protective case that can't be closed.The video quality is horrible. Every video I rerecorded had a horrible interference sound that renders all audio captured useless.This was my experience with this product and I recommend you stay away from it !

Reviews.Title: Did not work when needed
Reviews.Author: Ghansu "Ghansu"
Reviews.Content: I tried the camera with the memory card and for whatever reason it was having issues. I could not record my first ever track day because of this piece of (*&%!!! hate it!!!! I will not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: how does it work
Reviews.Author: adam garey
Reviews.Content: I love this Camera. I know not to expect too much ..Yet I have put together a few clips already and plan more..You have to be close up as I use it for people not for trips(skiing , or biking  or hiking)

Reviews.Title: preety good
Reviews.Author: ALLEN
Reviews.Content: Package was good my only complaint is about the waterproof case , I droped it once and when picked it back up the latch was broken.other than that I guess ill give it a thumbs up

Reviews.Title: Awkward & terrible sound quality
Reviews.Author: srd
Reviews.Content: I'm guilty for not reading the dimensions in the product details. This thing is huge for an action cam. - 2 to 3 times the size of others. Also, this cam has the worst audio quality, I've ever experienced. You can't hear anything but noise.The "mini dv camcorder", you the little cheap one ,they sell on amazon for $8 -$10 has just as good video quality & crystal clear audio. The only feature that's cool . Is the viewer. Wish it was a better cam.

Reviews.Title: look out 1/3 work
Reviews.Author: Kris Hendricks
Reviews.Content: I fought 3. And had to return 2 because they would not power up. Tried to call the company. And was put on hold for a hour. Called back and left a message but never got a reply.  I would not buy one. It is to hit and miss

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Vincent Dattoli
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything it's advertised to do and then some. I bought this camera for my 11 year old son because I couldn't afford a GoPro. It's been durable and takes great quality videos.

Reviews.Title: Defective On Arrival
Reviews.Author: James Jarvis
Reviews.Content: Another problematic model, no charging, works fine when plugged in, but can't hold a charge even for a second.It just craps out.

Reviews.Title: JUNK!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money. Will not charge. It will only turn on if connected to the charger stays on maybe five seconds and cuts back off. Have tried charging it for almost 3 days now with no luck. Never have I written a review before but this camera deserves the worst possible.

Reviews.Title: DOESN'T TURNS ON UNLESS PLUGGED IN!
Reviews.Author: Rodrigo
Reviews.Content: I want to return it or get a solution, where can I write a formal complain or get an answer of how can I solve this problem? Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Money
Reviews.Author: Charles Kay
Reviews.Content: This same camera is sold by a number of entities using different labels. I bought the same camera at Menards for $40. Recently I went on a diving trip to Roatan, Honduras. I used the camera every day for a week at depths of at least 60 feet at as deep as 130 feet and the housing was completely waterproof.  The picture and video quality is good but not excellent. With the 4G memory included you get about 30 minutes of video at pretty high definition ( or like 2000 still photos ). When fully charged it will video for at least 30 minutes. It's not really that wide angel and has no picture stabilization but what do you expect for $40. It's very light weight and durable.

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift for 13 year old
Reviews.Author: Michele Hargreaves
Reviews.Content: teenage son loved this gift. it works well, however he was very disappointed with the fasteners. but overall good product

Reviews.Title: Just a bad camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W. Timblin
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this, and was willing to make allowances for it's ultra low price.The video quality in 720 mode is choppy, it doesn't seem to have the horsepower to process the data.  Lowering the video quality to 480 gave much better results, but was no longer HD.In picture mode the images were very low quality, not something that I would share.Generally action cameras have a very wide angle lens, this does not.  This makes camera shake worse, and gives a limited field of view.I hope I can give it away.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: shirley bacon
Reviews.Content: only thing wish it had a mount for the camera to put on dash of car as well so could have that added verisitially but the price is great, works well quality of pictures and videos good

Reviews.Title: Didn't last
Reviews.Author: writer
Reviews.Content: I don't know what happened to this, but I bought it for my son to use to make videos on his scooter.  At the end of the week it was broken, the screen was blank, nothing.  We bought this instead of a gopro because of the price.  returned it to amazon, but forgot to take the sd card out!

Reviews.Title: good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: dan63052
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the amount you pay for it. Kind of dark if there are no good source of light. I tried to take a walk with it at night with street lights on and Christmas lights at people's houses. The video was practically pitch black until you pass a street light in which case you can only see the post and maybe 2 feet around. Other than that, it looks good on daylight and the mounts it came with are pretty solid. The waterproof casing is also water tight.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed for the price
Reviews.Author: Denise A Thornton
Reviews.Content: Bought this on Black Friday, and for a starter camera for my 10-year-old I could not be happier.  Be sure to buy an SD card, though, as it does not come with one.

Reviews.Title: Works great for me!
Reviews.Author: xtheoryx
Reviews.Content: So the main reason I wanted a camera like this was to record myself paintballing.The bike mount fits great on my barrel and doesn't budge!Quality of the video is great and it's exactly what I wanted for way cheaper than a gopro.The buttons on the waterproof case can sometimes be a pain to click but other wise a great buy!

Reviews.Title: gift to grandson
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: He used it once skiing it was fine loking forward to using on bike and taking on vacation nice gift

Reviews.Title: awsome camera
Reviews.Author: mike gariepy
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera for price it takes great video but do not expect a GoPro type of camera but all around this is a great camera.pros--great HD camera-good water proof casecons-hard to get to stay stable on the helmet I had to put a small screw in the mount to get it to stay completely steady

Reviews.Title: decent action camera for a kid
Reviews.Author: Cannon Dale
Reviews.Content: Definitely nowhere near GoPro quality but it is decent.The Good:-  $30, inexpensive and you still get 720- video quality acceptable. Just don't expect to make a nice clear video with this. Good starter for a kidThe Bad:- bike mount is horrible, poor quality mount resulted very shaky videos. Mount broke after first use. you can spend about $20 for a decent bike mount. Unfortunately, it means nearly doubling your investment. (knockoff  K Edge mount, tripod screw and a GoPro tripod mount should remove the shake).- To change from video to stills is troublesome. It means you have to take it out of the water resistant case and click a switch.- no way to tripod mount the camera without the water resistant casingBottom line, if you have already have a GoPro want a toss around camera or getting a camera for a kid, it's not bad. However, if you want to use this as a primary action camera, be prepared to be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Would not power on.
Reviews.Author: Kraig H. Pelkey
Reviews.Content: This camera was DOA.  I charged the battery, but it would not turn on.  The camera itself is built from cheap plastic. The waterproof case and mountings seemed to be built well.  I returned it, but will not be buying another one.

Reviews.Title: Little camera does the trick
Reviews.Author: Amy Leonard
Reviews.Content: We just tried this new camera on a fast, technical mountain biking tail. My husband first tried to attach the camera to his helmet, but the strap was too loose. We were in a rush to get going, so he admits he may not have tried it correctly. I will update here when we do. He attached the camera to his bike handlebars and it worked great there. It stayed on and in place through a very bumpy, rough trail. The video turned out great other than it makes you dizzy from all the movement (not the camera's fault). It's a very small camera, but that's what you want when you are doing sports. We plan to take it on some underwater adventures since it's waterproof.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Wilson
Reviews.Content: Given as gifts to grandchildren who seem to love it so far.  I was impressed with the quality compared to others that were more costly.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Paul A Mala
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for an avid bike rider who watches action videos on YouTube and wanted to create one. Package comes with the ,mounts for use with the bike or helmet. Very inexpensive compared to others I have seen and it is not flimsy. I would highly recommend this for any sports person or even as a dashboard cam.

Reviews.Title: Broke on first use
Reviews.Author: Christopher Shifflett
Reviews.Content: The only reason this product is getting 2 stars is that the picture quality isn't too terrible.Used this as a GoPro alternative for my motorcycle.  After first use, the power button shattered.  Rode around for 45 minutes and the power button shatters immediately after.  Since it's a Chinese made product, I can essentially expect no warranty on it.  I've heard customer service is absolutely abysmal, no point in trying.The natural picture zooms in so much, I couldn't even get a face shot from windshield of my bike.  However, the quality of the picture isn't nearly as bad as some reviewers made it out to be.And don't be fooled, IT DOES NOT WORK WITH GOPRO MOUNTS.  REPEAT: IT DOES NOT WORK WITH GOPRO MOUNTS.  I had to fabricate my own with good ol' trusty duct tape.It's junk, I would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Video quality meh, case broke immediately
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Carleson
Reviews.Content: While the camera itself isn't bad, the case that comes with this product is awful. The first time I tried to close it again after opening it up, the clasps just snapped. I am going to try and contact Emerson for a replacement, will update this when I hear back.

Reviews.Title: Used it parachuting a couple times. Decent, not bad FOR THE PRICE, and it's not gonna break on you.
Reviews.Author: Blake Bonar
Reviews.Content: This is sturdy, sort of ugly, and takes okay video. It's not bad FOR THE PRICE. The video really isn't bad, it's okay, and I would prefer good HD, but I don't care enough. I got this so I didn't have one more thing to worry about it falling off at 1200 feet and me getting upset about it.Criticism = I received the package which didn't contain the advertised micro SD card inside of it. I called the company and spoke with an Indian gentleman who asked me a series of questions for 5 minutes, and then I spoke to a lady for another 5, and they said they shipped the micro SD card. I received it a few days later. That was fine.What WASN'T fine was that I had to pay a small amount of money for the unpaid postage from the folks who sent it. It didn't offend me, and it didn't hurt me, it was under a dollar, but the fact that I paid more for a product because THEY messed up is improper business and results in bad reviews. Like this one.The product is okay, but the aforementioned screw up of the company was not okay.

Reviews.Title: For the price - it's pretty darn good
Reviews.Author: Ken Westermann
Reviews.Content: I thought I'd try this as an economical alternative to a GoPro.  It's cheap.  It feels cheap.  But it does a respectable job.It records in AVI, which I'm not wild about.  The quality is good enough though that I can tolerate the old codec.It does not offer offspeed settings like GoPro.  It's one fixed lens, standard depth, not a wide angle.  Pan a room with different kinds of lights and you can watch the white balance clicking through it's filters to find the right one.  Doesn't handle lowlight at all.It does have a built in mic, but you can only use it if the camera is not in it's housing.  The camera though does not have a tripod mount, the housing has a tripod mount.  So you have to pick - do you want to capture audio or do you want a steady tripod shot?I put a 16Gb card in the camera and that holds about 90 minutes in full res HD.  I don't know how much it will hold in 640x480 and that's because the battery only lasts about 2 hours on a full charge.  And it takes three to four hours to fully charge.Overall I'd say it's respectable for the price.  This can do 80% of what a GoPro can do and it's 1/5th the price.  And if it bites it someday I won't feel like I lost anything.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: But the battery only lasts a very few minutes. I am not all that happy with it but the price was right.

Reviews.Title: Awful, not worth even the cheap price.
Reviews.Author: William Mekemson
Reviews.Content: It was awful quality, very cheap and buttons broke easily.  The picture quality was mediocre, nothing in not perfect light, and the battery was terrible.  Returned it.

Reviews.Title: Garbage camera, don't waste the time.
Reviews.Author: BRENT JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: Absolute garbage!  I picked this up Black Friday at Ace Hardware.  I was excited to think I could give this to my kid as a less expensive alternative to a GoPro.  This won't accept any memory cards that are commonly sold.  I put a class 4 in, like suggested, and it crashed.  There isn't any internal memory, so the memory card is essential.  Steer clear of this camera.  It's cheap for a reason.  I read and rely on Amazon reviews for my purchases.  If you are like me, trust this review.  I'm so glad I did my own product test before I gave this to my son for Christmas.  I spent hours trying to get it to work and never got it going right.  Save the time and frustration.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: P. Bettke
Reviews.Content: I mounted the camera to my rearview mirror with the supplied handle bar mount. At the 5 megapixel 1080P setting it takes nice clear video. You won't be able to read a license plate with this unless you were very close to the car in front of you.When I leave the camera on , it will record for about 28 minutes before shutting itself off. I don't know if this is the limit of my 32 meg memory or the battery life. I will test it at 2 megapixels 720P and see if there is longer recording time. Comes with a computer cable,underwater case and handlebar/dash mount. Nice picture for the money . You can buy 4 of these cameras for the price of 1 Go pro camera.Night time recording is useless, this camera can't see the area of your headlights in front of your car. As with other reviews I find the plastic parts feel cheap. I removed and instaled this camera in its mount over a dozen times and didn't brake it yet. If it does brake, $35 gets a new one.

Reviews.Title: Emerson Action Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Ron T.
Reviews.Content: Although this camera was quickly shipped in a secure manner, the product failed to operate after a week of use in video and individual photo use.  This product was very economical to purchase and I should have known the quality would be less than desirable.  A photo was taken that would not leave the view finder no matter what was done, and when the camera's micro disk was checked, did not record an image.  Several times the camera failed to record images during important events and I eventually decided to purchase another camera.

Reviews.Title: Looks good but arrived DOA..May try again
Reviews.Author: William C. Smith
Reviews.Content: Looks like a nice product but it arrived DOA.  Having bad luck with cheapo solutions for action/dash cams and think the GoPros are way overpriced.  I do like the rear viewing screen on this model, and may try again.  Kudos to Amazons return system.

Reviews.Title: great camera...battery????
Reviews.Author: cat szyamczak
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera a while ago...I have used maybe twice and now it won't charge at all...I guess it just goes to show, you get what you pay for...Sad, cuz' have a great event coming up and would love to use my camera.

Reviews.Title: got a lemon
Reviews.Author: Bigbucks
Reviews.Content: My camera came in the original, sealed box. When I opened everything up I noticed 2 of the 4 screws that hold the camera case together were missing. Ooooppps, no quality control. When I charged the camera it would never take a full charge, and it would go dead in minutes. The Li-Po battery was shot.That said, I wasn't expecting much for under $40. The quality of the photos was terrible, but the video was OK. I was impressed with the mounts that came with it, and also the very small size. If the battery would have held up I would have been satisfied with this camera, especially for the price, but I sent it back within a week because of the issue.

Reviews.Title: Bad Product.  Good return service.
Reviews.Author: John Sells
Reviews.Content: This product was messed up.  It recorded videos and the playback was glitchy, and would jump around in the frames.  Luckily Amazon returns was helpful and I returned it for a full refund

Reviews.Title: Cheap Go-Pro
Reviews.Author: Richerd Smith
Reviews.Content: This thing is cool! Nice video quality (not 1080).This is your poor mans Go-Pro and it is worth every penny!I mounted it on my motorcycle helmet (via crazy glue) since it is only made for bicycle helmets.awesome water proof case makes it durable in the rain.would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: rmthunder "rmthunder"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little action cam for the price. Takes good video and pictures. It has a waterproof case you can put on it. My daughter and her friends had a blast with it in the swimming pool.

Reviews.Title: didn't work for me
Reviews.Author: Vladimir Efimov
Reviews.Content: when installed on the bike. recordings are very shaky,no matter how sturdy and stable the camera mount was(i didn't used original).

Reviews.Title: Decent action camera
Reviews.Author: D. Lessard
Reviews.Content: This camera is takes decent quality video.  However since it doesn't have a wide angle lens it is very shaky.  The default lens zoom which is not adjustable is a little too much which makes the shakiness worse.  I wish the mount was compatible with GoPro since all the aftermarket accessories are made for GoPro.  It would be mice if you could stick a wide angle lens in the waterproof case lens to give more versatility.For the price it's hard to beat though.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gary fraker
Reviews.Content: I love itIt works well on my 1/5 rc car I will tell friend works very good I love it

Reviews.Title: Not so Good!
Reviews.Author: RML
Reviews.Content: This item is a waste of time.  It is well packaged with lots of accessories but the video is awful.  Don't waste your money on this item as it is so bad that I don't understand how anyone can give it a good review unless it is in the very best of conditions.

Reviews.Title: doesn"t work very well and owners manual doesn"t tell you how to re format the card.
Reviews.Author: lawrence craig
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be easy to use, but its not. A 8 mg card only records like, one hour of time. Battery doesn:t last very long either and the user manual  doesn"t tell you how to reformat the card. Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Did not work as expected
Reviews.Author: Ken Williams
Reviews.Content: I purchased the cam for a zip line ride, I could not get the cam to activate inside the weatherproof case, so I did not get the pictures.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price!
Reviews.Author: DeadMarsh
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a GoPro you should check this camera out first. You get a waterproof case with mounting attachments to use for any sports filming. Granted that 720p is not as clean as 1080p but for basically $40 this will definitely get you started in the right direction.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: R. Talsma
Reviews.Content: Good for a first time action camera.  Video quality is 4 out of 10 at best.  But I bought it for my 12 year old son to play with on his bike and experimenting on remote controlled cars planes etc.  $40 gives me piece of mind that when he breaks it, oh well.It is far from a GoPro but my 1975 truck is not a Escalade either.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Craig E Nelson
Reviews.Content: The camera works well,and is a great deal for the money.My only criticism is that the sound quality is poor.I bought this to mount in my track car.The engine sound are very dim.The battery life is good,and I  don't regret the purchase at all!

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price
Reviews.Author: R. M. Clime
Reviews.Content: The Action cam is a lot of fun to use and the price of this camera is hard to beat. I purchased a 16GB micro card for it and will run for about two hours.  It can also serve as a very handy pocket camera.

Reviews.Title: Quick Delivery
Reviews.Author: Josh Williams
Reviews.Content: Great product, came with protective case, and is much cheaper than the go cam editions, extremely durable have brought it climbing and surfing already.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Carlos Perez
Reviews.Content: good for the price especialy if you loose it in the water like i lost my first go pro...purchase 3 you could have three different angles of action...three for the price of one go pro at $50ea.emreson vs $200 go pro

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Sheila D. Wood
Reviews.Content: Perfect ... Especially for the price. Using it so far in water sports, kayaking and canoeing on the creeks and the Alabama River.

Reviews.Title: No recommendation to purchase!
Reviews.Author: mario luna
Reviews.Content: Battery has a short life and I had to purchase the chord to charge it separately ($21.00). It was supposed to come in the box.

Reviews.Title: Camera Review - Not good at night
Reviews.Author: Michelle H.
Reviews.Content: I guess I just figured an action camera would work at night. We even added extra external lighting with no success so we're going to try an infared light. The quality of the image is excellent during the day. It's not made of super heavy duty material but if it's treated with care should hold up. We're going to keep it and try to make it work.

Reviews.Title: Emerson Go Action Cam HD Digital video camera
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lush
Reviews.Content: My grandson loved it. He especially liked that he could take it to the swimming pool and record he and his friends fun times.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I got this camera mostly for hunting and snowmobileing, I haven't really tried it out much other than walking the dog and taking some short videos. The clarity seems fair for the price although it is a little finicky about what simm card you use, It didn't seem to have enough speed to catch an arrow in flight but I may not have the settings correct for that? All in All I would say it is a good bargain and I am relatively happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: I was all set to buy the Go Pro until a friend showed me this one.  for the cost of this one I can set multiple cameras on the bike to shoot at different angles.  As for the quality of the video I find it quite acceptable.  I usually have it on the mount on the handlebar of the Goldwing or the dashboard of my Car.  At times i put it on the helmet mount.  No matter where I place the camera I find very little issues with the video.

Reviews.Title: Head cam
Reviews.Author: Johan
Reviews.Content: This is cool runnings, never thougt life can be so interesting, now everything is captured on camera and the playback is so cool.

Reviews.Title: all good, thank you very much
Reviews.Author: jose maria scheverin
Reviews.Content: hello all good, the product is what I expected, arrived in perfect condition according to the agreement, thank you very much

Reviews.Title: Great alternative to go pro
Reviews.Author: jose
Reviews.Content: Great pic and video. Waterproof feature and case work great. Only thing I would like to see would be a way to attach a strap to it.

Reviews.Title: Works fro me
Reviews.Author: Ironman Irishman "Kevs world"
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Go Cam Kit Description says what is says about the product well built and The Accessories are not cheaply built, the Water proof case the Handle bar mount work perfect on a 1 " Rifle Scope for my Hunts and witnessing MOA on Target shooting , the video capture is a little fuzzy when you fire but not  So bad not to see a clear hit . I am sure there are better camera's out there but their discount price can not be beat well packaged no damage and arrived before due date !Thanks Amazon # 1 in America for finding neat stuff at a bargain !

Reviews.Title: I wanted it to work.
Reviews.Author: Burnard S. Parker Jr.
Reviews.Content: The on/off button stuck in "on" position at first use. Had to send it back ON because it would not turn off.  Good idea in principle but questionable quality.  Would have just exchanged it for a new one but no customer service except Amazon (and they only do refunds for this item unless it was damaged in shipping).  There was a technical support number but only 9-5 M-F and I was sure they could not un-stick the on/off button.

Reviews.Title: Emerson Go Action Cam
Reviews.Author: Sarah A.
Reviews.Content: I think this will be a good action camera for my 10 yr. old son. The camera itself is quite tiny outside of it's case.  It mounts easily to his fishing rod and seems simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Stephen Smith
Reviews.Content: Good quality picture for the price. Only complaint is it is not as wide angle as the more expensive cameras.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Willie Gee
Reviews.Content: If you are considering the purchase of an Emerson Action Cam for use on boat to capture fishing action, this is NOT your camera!  This camera is probably better suited for dash cam video or use on bike, where there may be no need for a wide angle view of the action.  This camera has a rather limited field of view and I can't find a place on my boat far enough away from the action to capture everything in the shot.I really did not expect super great quality for the price I paid on the 2 cameras I purchased.  One was defective upon arrival and will not hold a charge and the video recorded is extremely choppy.  The other one works fine but is not suited for my use.  Overall if I had to do this over again, I would have went ahead and purchased a GoPro and been done with it.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price...
Reviews.Author: JOHN SMART
Reviews.Content: It's a decent camera and does what it say's it would. Wish the battery lasted a little longer. Attached it to my motorcycle takes good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera...
Reviews.Author: Mister Vic
Reviews.Content: They say you get what you pay for...I made out like a bandit then...I got back into biking and wanted to film some of the local trails. Of course, everyone talks about the GoPro, but not wanting to spend THAT much money I opted for a lesser priced camera. So I bought this...and really like it. It came with a bike and helmet mount. The mount itself is plastic and does not have a super solid feel but it has held up well so far.Pros:- Super lightweight- I've gotten 1.5 hours of video at 640-480 per charge- Audio is pretty decentCons:- No indicator to know it's recordingOverall, a great little camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This product is great for the price you pay for it. I use this product for my travel agency to make videos while on different vacations.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Scott K. Brigham "scottebeat"
Reviews.Content: Resolution isn't great, but its an awesome deal at under $55. I do a lot of work with media and the images created look a bit blurry for 720p, but with everything included for this price its an unbeatable bargain.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Brandon Bartell
Reviews.Content: great for the value. terrific beginner camera. i'm using it for hang gliding. comes with all brackets you might need.

Reviews.Title: Go Action Cam does the job
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: Can't really beat the product for the price.  The waterproof case has some vibration noise while riding, so a little foam filling of some sort may work to reduce the noise.  Doesn't beat the quality of a GoPro, but for those not willing to part with $300+ for one, this one meets my standard for what I am willing to part with.

Reviews.Title: Out of Box defect
Reviews.Author: Hanre B. Chang "hcbaron"
Reviews.Content: Item would not charge straight out of box. Kept it plugged in for more than two hours, still no charge. I returned it for a full refund. Very disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Not a GoPro
Reviews.Author: Paul M Land
Reviews.Content: I was not expecting this camera to be a Go Pro. It works very well and I love the camera. I do feel that the case shouls come with a vented cover for better audio.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Joaquin Garcia
Reviews.Content: Mounted the camera to the bars of my ATV rode it for 10 minutes. Camera moves from all the vibration. Reviwed video and sound is good the first 5 seconds then the sound minimizes. Camera shakes a lot. Looks like helmet mount is not desinged for dirt bike helmet.

Reviews.Title: CAN YOU BUY GO PRO HEAD MOUNT FOR THIS PRODUCT?
Reviews.Author: Joe Antonucci
Reviews.Content: love this item, cant wait to try it out at tough mudder.... just wondering does anyone know if you can get a head mount for this camera? would the go pro head mount work?

Reviews.Title: Great Alternative at Much Lower Price
Reviews.Author: Ken LaRue
Reviews.Content: Great Alternative at Much Lower PriceFeatures meet my needs for a much lower price than Go Pro similar product.  Works great for ATV use and underwater wideo

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the price - don't forget your class 4 SD card
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I bought this cam at Big Lots for $39.99 with no card. You can put up to a 32gig micro sd card. I bought an 8gig on eBay for $6. As other reviews say, YOU MUST USE A CLASS 4 CARD! It doesn't matter if it's SD or SDHC.FYI: An 8gig card at 720p HD, gets me 36 minutes of recording time.DOUBLE FYI: Although this has an internal battery, you CAN charge and record at the same time. A standard cigarette phone charger worked for me.Overall for the price, it's not a bad camera if you don't need a go pro or don't feel like spending more money.Here is a video of the Emerson Action Cam with the Go Pro suction mount.[...]

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: great and interesting game!!!!!!!
Reviews.Content: This small versatile camera is great, it's hd quality Is not better than the go pro, but this is a much better buy, the screen on the back is a great feature. This camera is a great buy for a low price, definitely recommend it....

Reviews.Title: Emerson Go Action Cam 720p HD Digital Video Camera
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Fox
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera, the only problem I had was when in the case I could not change the setting from video to camera.

Reviews.Title: Not for Action
Reviews.Author: Barry B. Hughes
Reviews.Content: Save your money and get a go-pro 3 or a contour roam camera. This doesn't hold much of a charge and has nothing built in to stabilize the video quality while you moving, it just goes blurry over all quality was poor. the bike mounts do not work with the new over sized handle bars that are on most mt. bikes. would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: good and bad
Reviews.Author: duner077
Reviews.Content: The video is very nice if you are on a smooth road but once you do any action like ride at the sand dunes you can't tell what anything is. The video was very shaky no matter where or how I mounted it. You get what you pay for. Cheap.

Reviews.Title: Emerson Go Action Cam
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Very good camera. Does everything as described. Got this for my son and he likes it a lot. Uses it in swimming pool to take videos.

Reviews.Title: A decent camera at a much cheaper price than the GoPro
Reviews.Author: Joseph Tadlock
Reviews.Content: I bought mine at a brick/motor in town for 49 dollars. Yeah, the quality seems a little cheap, features seem to be lacking. But dollar for dollar the price is good.The case works fine in water, but I haven't used mine in anything other than a swimming pool so I don't know what depth it can handle. The accessories for mounting the camera are secure and there's no fear of it flying off at highway speeds. ( I use mine on my motorcycle and while mountain biking)I would buy this produce again.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: jen123
Reviews.Content: shoots pretty good quality images and videos. It doesn't quite compare to goPro but a great deal for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great starter Action Cam!
Reviews.Author: Alberto Mattar "BERTIMUS MAXIMUS"
Reviews.Content: For starters the camera and mounts etc came very well packaged. It is actually what its described as, an economical action cam. it is worth more than the $45 I paid for it. all the mounts are easy to use. Directions are pretty much to the point and in  English thank gosh! Any novice consumer with some smart phone capabilities can learn to use all the features in the camera in less than 5 minutes. audio and video quality are okay, I think its closer to 480p than 720p but not bad, that's why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. My kids used it all weekend long to film them selves doing gymnastics and parkour training. the camera held up. The water proof case is pretty awsome. I have a planned weekend of kayak fishing and camping coming up on the new river, I am pretty confident that the camera will do fine. Its a good camera for the money, The camera charges fine, uploads video very easy with no converting involved. you can upload very quickly to the web(youtube).

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT ITS WORTHLESS
Reviews.Author: Fernando Nogueira
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this product, it sucks, I bought and did not work even after charging the battery several times, buy a GoPro worth what you spend.

Reviews.Title: Emerson Go Action Cam 720p HD Digital Video Camera
Reviews.Author: Russ Beauvais
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an inexpensive alternative to costlier action cams. I really like it! I like the fact that it has the rear display which is a big help in setting the view. Operation is easy. Due to it being so inexpensive, I don't worry that my son mounts it on his hockey goaltender helmet. I just wish that Emerson made additional mounting options for it, particularly a mount for motorsports-type helmets. The included helmet mount is for vented-type bicycle helmets and such. The handle bar mount is good for bicycles but not for my Rokon all-terrain motorbike out in the back country since the ride is quite rough and the video is very shaky. A decent helmet mount would take care of that problem. If you are creative, mounts for other brands can be made to work.

Reviews.Title: the camera in a p.o.c
Reviews.Author: john mcgrath
Reviews.Content: camera has no battery life  you can't see the vew finder in sun light and you have to charge on comp.

Reviews.Title: of course, your phone records much, much, much better video and takes better pictures.
Reviews.Author: omgoodness
Reviews.Content: you might want to buy it when you don't want to take the risk of damaging your phone in a case where you have pool partyand you cannot 100% trust the flimsy waterproof skin for your iphone. and plus, it doesn't look very attractive so no one will steal it when you leave it on the beach chair.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Chupes1970
Reviews.Content: The adjustments are plastic and already broken. You can't mount this on an offload MX helmet unless you drill into the helmet which is a safety issue. Not a camera for Extreme sports that's for sure. If your a dirt bike or Atv rider the only place to mount this and see what you want is to zip tie it on a chest protector. The handlebar mount doesn't fit properly on the dirt bikes.

Reviews.Title: died
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Battery only lasted for 30 minutes. I wasPressing stop and record the whole time and it wasn't getting itBecause the battery died. I felt like my river rafting adventureWas a waste.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Purchase.
Reviews.Author: Matthew Crary
Reviews.Content: Extremely unsatisfied with this camera. I got it, and was like "oh yeah!" Took it out of the box, charged it for about 2 hours (because of how small the battery is) and now it will only turn on if it's plugged it. No matter how long I charge it it will not stay on for more than 30 seconds. Garbage. Might as well spend the money and get a GoPro or Contour.

Reviews.Title: Promotional video shot using a GoPro Hero 3. Pretty shady...
Reviews.Author: R. Montemayor "Xave"
Reviews.Content: Before purchasing this camera research this product on YouTube and you will see this company used GoPro Hero 3 footage to advertise this product. They video edited segments of footage where the gopro logo was inserted. Not very smart as I'm sure legal action is soon to come. Any company that does that I'm hesitant on investing in.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money and time
Reviews.Author: robert horn
Reviews.Content: Piece of junk do not buy. I wanted a cheap Go Pro for tactical shooting and this thing didn't even last one tactical run. Don't wast your time.

Reviews.Title: Cheap...exactly that....cheap
Reviews.Author: Kyle Stearman
Reviews.Content: I bought it cause it was cheaper and I used it once and the water proof box fell apart!!! Cheap

Reviews.Title: fair
Reviews.Author: guillermo c.
Reviews.Content: Good price and picture gave this item 2star for the reasone that when u put in the water proof case their is no sound also the picture moves to much when mount on bike or helment also the batterie life is small only get out of it about 1hour to 45 min and then it dies but fo 40$ its fair

Reviews.Title: CHEAP CHEAP
Reviews.Author: Kevin Jimenez
Reviews.Content: ITS STOP RECORDING EVERY FEW SECOND.... SOMETIMES IT WONT RECORD...... VERY CHEAP MATERIAL, THE RESOLUTION SUCKS FOR TO BE HD VIDEO AND DOESN'T  GIVE YOU A WIDE ANGLE, IT GIVES A CLOSE ZOOM ANGLE... DON'T RECOMEND

Reviews.Title: Southern Telecom Emerson Action Camera
Reviews.Author: AREC
Reviews.Content: Poor quality product,  the water proof casing clasp broke off after the second try putting the camera inside, I have the camera attached to the back of my bicycle, have not used it yet.  I feel that it will be a worthless product.

Reviews.Title: No worth the money
Reviews.Author: Donna Haff
Reviews.Content: The battery last about 10 mins from a full charge.  It is worth paying more to get a longer battery life

Reviews.Title: Internal Memory, or the lack thereof
Reviews.Author: Hope
Reviews.Content: There wasn't enough information on it so I didn't know I also needed to buy an so card for it because it has no internal memory. Also, it is so cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Great little action cam!
Reviews.Author: Vall H. Miller
Reviews.Content: I really can't find anything I don't love about this camera, except the microphone! The sound quality is perhaps the only drawback of this neat little video camera. Just wish it had more volume. Hard to believe it does such a good job for such a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great great quality
Reviews.Author: Andrea S.
Reviews.Content: I think this is quite comprisable to the GoPro's I researched especially for the huge price difference! I was very pleased

Reviews.Title: Worth the money - not a 500  dolar camera but it works.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth E. Udut "Kenneth Udut (Ken)"
Reviews.Content: Remember: You're getting a waterproof camera setup that mounts to things and records standard AVI for under 50 dollars.Keeping that in mind, it's a good deal because you're getting video without cords, in a tough little case for 10% of the price of the "good one".

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: toM HADDAD
Reviews.Content: I wasn't thinking this 40 dollar camera would be a go pro or anything but reading reviews I thought maybe it would be worth it. Well used it this past weekend and it's a peice of junk! It doesn't focus correctly as your filming a video, if you move the camera it goes out of focus tlll you stop then it corrects itself. There is no way this is a 720 video, i have a cheap camera with a video option and the clearity is much better. I would not suggest taking the chance like I did, not even worth the 40 bucks. Not sure I will watse my time putting it under water.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: alejandro quirola
Reviews.Content: i cant afford a Go Pro but this one do the job very nice... i will buy two or 3 more

Reviews.Title: Motorcycle rider must have
Reviews.Author: Fernando Sotomayor
Reviews.Content: Good resolution, a little bit of wider angle needed, but worth for the price anyway!... already having fun with it...

Reviews.Title: Batter life to short
Reviews.Author: Billy Pemb
Reviews.Content: This camera has a fairly clear picture but the batter does not last very long at all the most i have got for batter life is about 1 hr 20 min if you can live with that then buy it picture quality is ok

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA EVER
Reviews.Author: julian
Reviews.Content: This is a grate camera u have to bye a memory card for it but other then that its amazing.

Reviews.Title: just give me one that works
Reviews.Author: Raylin
Reviews.Content: Bought camera from mintalicious showed up on time worked fine when I tried it. The problem is it doesn't charge and every avenue of customer assistance is blocked with an email pointing u in another direction.they even sent me a link to I go pro for my return. Still after a few emails back and forth I don't have a camera that works and I didn't get a refund. Avoid mintalicious at all costs because it will cost u more in the end.

Reviews.Title: extremely weak mount, low quality video
Reviews.Author: Jaime Zana
Reviews.Content: This camera seemed to me like a great alternative to the more expensive Go Pro's.  As it turns out, you get exactly what you pay for.  Low quality video, a microscopic field of view and everything included is made of the cheapest plastic.  I mounted it securely with extra reinforcement (added velcro strips) to my friends jet ski to get some sweet video of us out on the lake and the stand broke after not even 5 minutes.  the camera was lost in the water.  would NOT recommend to ANYONE!!

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift!
Reviews.Author: Linda Wiksten
Reviews.Content: I haven't used this. It is a gift for my son, but way cheaper than the $300 one I almost bought.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Scooter Freak
Reviews.Content: This product is horiable! I had it for 2 days. On the second day it wouldn't turn on and the power button got stuck in the camera. Like I said before don't buy it just buy a Go Pro it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: SD vs. SDHC card
Reviews.Author: KID ZAP 123 "KID ZAP 123"
Reviews.Content: Can anyone tell me if I can use a SDHC card vs. an SD card. I know that it should be a class 4 but I'm not sure about the SD vs. SDHC. What are you folks using? Let me know! Thanks, KZ123

Reviews.Title: nice little camera!
Reviews.Author: Ty "uspatriota"
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera to take fishing with me on the Clearwater River in Idaho to prove that I do catch fish! this camera is simple and easy to use. Apparently people think that: I fish....therefore, I lie. I don't have to worry about droppining my expensive camera or worry about the rain. Only two buttons to worry about. one to turn it on and one to start recording or take picture.!

Reviews.Title: Worthless, save your money and buy a real camera! Non existent customer service
Reviews.Author: Camper Van Beethoven
Reviews.Content: Killer price so I went for it, big mistake as I should have known better and read more reviews.First the pluses:The case is pretty solid and the camera is easy to use. Video output is AVI.Now the minuses:Mounting system is cheaply made and looks like it will shatter on the first tumble if you're biking or skiing. Made of cheap brittle plastic. The round cutout for handlebar mounting is too small to fit anything other than a child's bike. Seatpost mounting is out as well.Playing back the first video on the PC was a little revealing of the fun that was yet to come. It would only play back using VLC. Quicktime and windows media player had issues.The real disappointment was when I uploaded the vid to youtube when on playback, multicolored stripes filled the entire lower third of the screen. Tried it 3x, always the same. Did a search and found others having the same issues.Tried to contact Emerson CS and first found the TV Emerson CS is different than other consumer products and was referred to another Emerson division. Called them and was informed *another* company handled this camera and was given another number. Still with me?Called this number & got a simple answering machine of some guys office and subsequent calls never worked again, got the fast busy signalling an overloaded phone line. Did a search on the phone number and found others having the same issues with non working CS and no answer when they get through.There's a reason it's $40, it's a POS.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: kDogg
Reviews.Content: Would make a good kids toy. Works but quality is meh. Save your money and by a good one or don't buy one at all.

Reviews.Title: Would purchase again or recommend
Reviews.Author: Jerrie S.
Reviews.Content: I bought two of the Emerson Action cameras as gifts for the grandchildren.  They were VERY pleased, so for sure,  grandma is also pleased!

Reviews.Title: question
Reviews.Author: mike
