Reviews.Content: i am thinking about purchasing this camera, my buddy and i have really gotten into wake boarding and we also ski water and snow and ride snowmobiles.I am looking to make videos like the ones you see for the go pro or red bull commercials. i am also looking to do still shots with this camera, now my question is can i take still shots with this camera ? or does the camera only take videos ? if any one who has this product could help me out with some personal experience id appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: did not work
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: the camera would only work plugged in kind of defeated the under water capabilities screen would not show option defective camera amazon returned it with out a problem

Reviews.Title: Mounts
Reviews.Author: Tiffani
Reviews.Content: What are the sizes of the mounts because i need a new ones without buying the camera, also like a suction cup. Does anyone know? Please respond.

Reviews.Title: VERY CHEAP, BUYER BEWARE!
Reviews.Author: Death
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera yesterday from big lots and tried to put the SD card from my Evo in it and its a class 4 SD card, but when I tried to use it, it froze and I didn't notice the reset button until I took it apart to have a look at its guts. I was very disappointed with what I found... I was greeted with very cheap wiring and components. When I tried to carefully put it back together, the switch to change modes somehow snapped off. So I exchanged it for another one the next day. I got another SD card to go with it and tested it before I left the lot and it texted good. When I got home, I got to play around with it.Now for the facts that matter to most buyers. This camera doesn't have a focus at all, so if what you're taking a picture of or recording is out of the preset focus zone, you're capturing blur. The screen isn't very clear, but it gives you an idea of what you're pointing at. It sucks in the dark, you can't adjust brightness or contrast and the zoom seems to be pointless because it just blurs more, but on the bright side you can zoom while recording. I haven't had a chance to test the sound quality yet.Just to put this into better prospective, this reminds my of cameras from 1999ish. My HTC Evo 4g (first Evo) has a better camera... after tax, I paid $43.99 and I kinda feel like I got ripped off. A good price for this camera would be about 29.98 after tax seeing as it comes with good mounting hardware and a waterproof case. Then again, you have to buy your own SD card if you buy it from big lots, so $15.99 after tax would be a fair price in my honest opinion. I'm going to be mounting this to my dirtbike when I get home, I'll also test the sound then and upload videos to YouTube. I've already made comparison videos of it vs my phone, I just can't upload them yet because they are 720p and I only have 3g right now, so it'd take forever and the upload would keep getting interrupted.On the bright side its easy to use, you don't really need the instructions it comes with. They come in 2 colors, the plastic isn't cheap and I'm over 1000miles from home, so I'm trying to break it before I head home, so I can take it back if needed. So far its solid as long as its in the case. If go pro has a camera that this can compare to, I don't see how they can charge as much as they do...that said, I'm sure they compare them just to make more sales. This camera seems nearly weightless out of the case and in the case, it feels like its less than half a pound... if they made this same product and added auto focus, brightness, contrast, sharpness and sold it with an SD card, it'd be worth what I paid and I'd feel like I got a good deal.

Reviews.Title: 40 bucks at big lots
Reviews.Author: Love to Read
Reviews.Content: the equipment that this camera comes with is okay. That is all I have to say about this camera. It is okay. Not great but okay. It is not worth 80 bucks. It does take videos and there are several posted on youtube. I got this camera at big lots for 39.99. It is a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the investment.
Reviews.Author: K'Tesh
Reviews.Content: The only good thing about this? You can point to it and hopefully bluff someone into confessing what they did to you in the event of a crash.I got this for Christmas after complaining about not being able to work with GoPro's mount.  The GoPro requires you to screw on and screw off your camera each time you lock your bike up.  I've since lost the screw, and paying for the grab bag of mounts for a single screw seems...  screwed up.The mount is small, but for my bike's mounting location, it worked well enough.  Don't expect to get it to fit close to the stem of your bike, so your photos/videos will be offset some.There is something deeply wrong with the camera.  Half the time I can turn the thing on, but not be able to turn it off.  The cheap plastic buttons on the main body of the camera lodge under the main body's housing, and no amount of reasonable pressure will get them unstuck.When the camera locks up when on, there's only one way to turn it off... Remove the memory card (which is an additional $35-50USD for a Class 10 32 Gb Micro SD card).  Whatever you were filming will not be saved.Customer Service?  What's that?  Took me forever to find a phone number for Emmerson's Customer Service, and then they told me that it was a licensed product or something... the lady gave me a phone number for another company which I called, waited forever (10+ minutes of being told my call was very important), then finally opted to leave my phone number for a call back.  (Message assured me it would be in one business day)  It's been over a month now, and I haven't heard from them.The only reason I still have the camera?  Someone Tossed the packaging and BIG LOTS! won't accept it back w/o the original packaging.This thing sucksTheir Customer Service SucksSave your money up and buy a real camera.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Peter J. Nunnery "pjanimals"
Reviews.Content: I have not taken it out on my kayak yet. I hope it will do find. It is what I could afford. I will let you know. Still learning.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Ana Mateo
Reviews.Content: , I didn't receive a charger , the mount was broken and I still haven't been able to use the camera !!I had a very project due this week and needed the camera for it and I was excited for nothing !!! I'm furious ! I wasted my money ! Don't waste your money !

Reviews.Title: Best thing ever!
Reviews.Author: Yes
Reviews.Content: Better then go pro hAs a screen same quality as gopro just better because of screen and case in thicker

Reviews.Title: not a wide angle , fogging
Reviews.Author: msl4492
Reviews.Content: i was happy with the camera picture quality. i bought this to put on the front of my hobie 16 sailboat. with the camera situated on the front of the boat the picture didnt start until about 4 ft in front of the camera.also something that i was less pleased about. upon the first attempt at using this camera on my sail boat. once we got back to the dock i removed the camera and noticed that there was some condensation on the inside of the case. once i reviewed the footage its startes out clear then fogged up. once we turned around and headed back it got clear again. im gonna try and get some fogX to fix this problem

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It For Taking Photos
Reviews.Author: Loma Prieta
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, this camera was a complete waste of time, including repackaging it for a full refund.Minuses- No AC adapter or charger. Aside from having to charge it in a PC USB port, I was able charge it by using a Nook-to-USB charger/adapter.- There is NO camera flash.- At initial testing, indoor photos came out blurry - it seemed as if there were no automatic controls for focusing and exposure.- The camera, removed from its shell, felt fragile and cheaply built.- From purchase at a discount store, there was no indication on the box that a Micro-SD Card was required.- There was  no indication on the box (or instructions) that specifically, a class 4 or 5 Micro-SD Card was required.Pluses+ Great attachments for handlebars and helmet, along with additional rubber shims.+ Great looking AND feeling camera in its protective underwater casing - if only this camera functioned at least like a basic point and shoot.Avoid purchasing this as a photo camera.

Reviews.Title: Absolute Junk
Reviews.Author: find_me_hiking
Reviews.Content: Bought this because of it's price point..you get what you pay for. There is a reason all the other brands are more expensive, and it's because they are providing the customer with a quality product. This camera however, certainly doesn't qualify. Avoid it like the Plague.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: James Dean
Reviews.Content: plz for the love of god i am saving your life DO NOT EVER buy this camera it is a GIANT peice of s***... im warning you do not waste your money you will be so pissed off it will be unreal... plz im begging you dont buy this camera
